gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Major World Crop Areas and Climatic Profiles from the USDA/NOAA Joint Agricultural Weather Facility (JAWF)

gmd:alternateTitle.gco:CharacterString: Major World Crop Areas and Climatic Profiles
Major World Crop Areas and Climatic Profiles

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The Major World Crop Areas and Climatic Profiles presentsclimatological data, agricultural statistics, and crop calendarinformation for widely ranging crop areas. It serves as a referencefor evaluating the effect of weather on world crop production. Foreach of the world's major crop growing areas, the report describesaverage (normal) weather patterns and historical crop area, yield, andproduction trends. It also highlights unique landforms and climaticfeatures important to the region.The paper version is available from:ERS-NASS5285 Port Royal RoadSpringfield, VA 221611-800-999-6779The World Crop Areas and Climatic Profiles are being made availableonline at:"http://www.usda.gov/oce/weather/pubs/Other/MWCACP/MajorWorldCropAreas.pdf" [ This document was provided by NASA's Global Change Master Directory. For more information on the source of this metadata please visit http://gcmd.nasa.gov/r/geoss/[GCMD]USDA_NOAA_WORLD_CROP_AREAS ]

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: USDA/OCE/WC/PUBS > Publications, Weather and Climate, Office of Chief Economist, U. S. Department of Agriculture
